alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 11:20AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hamilton and northern Herkimer Counties through NOON EDT... At 1119 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Big Moose, or near Old Forge, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water. Locations impacted include... Old Forge, Inlet, Brown Tract Pond Campground, Limekiln Lake Campground, Big Moose, Eighth Lake Campground, Eagle Bay, Raquette Lake, Golden Beach Campground, Alger Island Public Campground, Little Rapids, Beaver River, Carter Station, Quaker Beach, Partlow, Sagamore, Brandreth, Woods Lake, Hasbroucks and Russian Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
